charges.charge_description: 21:846, 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B)(iii); CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS; Conspiracy to Distribute and Possess with Intent to Distribute 50 Grams or More of Cocaine Base. (LESSER INCLUDED OFFENSE)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to a term of Eighty Four (84) Mopnths incarceration. Said sentence to run consecutive to the sentence defendant is serving in Washington, DC's Superior Court, Case No. 2009-CF3-19937. Defendant placed on Supervised Release for a period of Four (4) Years. Defendant to pay immediately a Special Assessemnt of 100.00 to the Clerk of the Court for the U.S. District Court, District of Columbia

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B)(iii); NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE; Unlawful Distribution of Five Grams or More of Cocaine Base.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: DISMISSED BY ORAL MOTION OF THE GOVERNMENT.

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to a mandatory minimum term of Sixty (60) Months incarceration, credit for time served.
